subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=4|rs=人08}}

# [[climate]]
# [[season]]
# [[weather]]

subSections.title: Readings
See also
Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|こう|yomi=o}}

From {{der|ja|ltc|sort=こう|-}} {{ltc-l|候}}. The ''{{ll|ja|漢音|kan'on}}'' pronunciation, so likely a later borrowing.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|y=kan|こう|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|こう}}

# {{lb|ja|literary|sort=こう}} the [[season]], the [[weather]] of the current season

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|厳%寒の候|げん%かん の こう|the [[cold]]est season or weather}}
* {{ja-r|伺%候|し%こう|[[wait]]ing [[upon]] ([[someone]])}}

subSections.title: Compounds
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|うかみ|yomi=k}}
{{rfe|ja|Daijirin-only entry, probable RFD}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|うかみ}}

# {{lb|ja|obsolete|sort=うかみ}} {{alternative spelling of|lang=ja|窺見||[[lookout]], [[scout]]}}

subSections.title: Etymology 3
Alternative forms
subSections.text: * {{ja-l|候ふ}} (''archaic'')

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|y=k|そうろう}}

subSections.title: Verb
subSections.text:
{{ja-verb|type=3|そうろう|hhira=さうらふ}}

# {{lb|ja|archaic|sort=そうろう}} {{alternative form of|lang=ja|候う||to [[serve]]; to [[be]]}}

subSections.title: Derived terms
Compounds
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|居%候|い%そうろう|[[freeloader]], [[sponger]]}}
* {{ja-r|候%文|そうろう%ぶん|[[epistolary]] [[style]]}}

subSections.title: Etymology 4
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|そろ|yomi=k}}
Late-medieval transition from ''sōrō'' above.<ref name=DJR>{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|y=k|そろ}}

subSections.title: Verb
Derived terms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|又%候|また%ぞろ|([[yet]]) [[again]]}}

subSections.title: Etymology 5
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|y=k|ぞうろ}}
